a former state Republican chairman. Mike Pence 's staff did not return repeated phone calls and e-mails to The Associated Press. The 51-year-old Mike Pence is a darling of social conservatives and often describes himself as a Christian, a conservative, and a Republican, in that order. He had made multiple trips to states that host early Barack Obamaial primary contests. Mike McDaniel said the decision not to run must have been difficult. "He had a lot of people around the country

a favorite of Republicans who like Mitch Daniels ' broad experience and fiscal credentials. Mitch Daniels has said he won't make a decision about running for president until after this year's legislative season ends in April. If( Mitch Daniels ) runs, I think it's hard for Mike Pence , because all the financial base in Indiana would likely go to Mitch Daniels , Charlie Black said. But Mike Pence also can't afford to wait to decide because he has a long way to go in building a fundraising network and a campaign team, and becoming better-known. As

urging him to run for Barack Obama ( also signed by former congressmen Jim Ryun and Dick Armey ) tells me he's "Disappointed, but not surprised" about Mike Pence 's decision to rule out running for Barack Obama in 2012. I think he's made the best decision for his family, L. Brent Bozell III continues. "Besides, he's young- 51. He has plenty of time." Others close to the draft movement admit to be in a "funk" about Mike Pence 's decision.

been burned for three straight games of at least 40 points by the 76ers All-Star. "Honestly, they play me one-on-one, straight up," Allen Iverson said of a Bucks' defense he penetrated at will. Allen Iverson reached 40 points against the Bucks for the sixth time in his career, his most against any opponent. He had 40 and 54 points in his previous two games
